headline.main: SOVIET GAPS FILLED; Nazi Encirclement Plan Reported Thwarted as Fresh Units Rush Up

lead_paragraph: BERNE, Switzerland, Saturday, Oct. 11 -- Soviet forces, striking back vigorously after their defensive structure had received a shaking for two days, held the Germans to such good effect during the last twenty-four hours that a Russian radio announcement early today was able to report "no change of any importance along the entire front."
abstract: USSR forces thwart German encirclement plans
